steps.title: Here’s your objective.
steps.description:
In this mission, you’ll practice using the Grasping Grippers.

Build GRIPP3R 01.

steps.title: Let’s try it out!
steps.description: Place the Grasping Grippers on a smooth surface, then download and run the program.
steps.commentTODO: This block sets the speed at which the Grasping Grippers open and close.

hints.Text:
1. Press the connect icon and follow the on-screen instructions.
2. Download and run the program.
2. Download the program to your EV3 Brick.
3. Run the program from your EV3 Brick.
